title: Lai Muhammed, Uzor Kalu, others for Timelineng Social Media Advocacy Lecture

organizations.name: timelineng social media advocacy lecture home

text:
Home » Columns » People & Politics » Lai Muhammed, Uzor Kalu, others for Timelineng Social Media Advocacy Lecture Lai Muhammed, Uzor Kalu, others for Timelineng Social Media Advocacy Lecture On 2:30 am In People & Politics by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
Nigeria’s minister of Information, Culture and Tourism, Alhaji Lai Muhammed, will be leading other dignitaries to the inaugural lecture being put together by a top online media outfit, www.timelineng.com, billed to hold on Tuesday 18th, april 2017 at Sheraton Hotels, Ikeja, Lagos. 
The event put together by the educative platform of the online media house, Timeline Awareness Initiative (TAI ), according to the organizers, was borne out of the brands urge to exploit the vast knowledge of professionals to get Nigerians more informed about the use of various social media platforms for prompt dissemination of information in tackling the country’s myriad of challenges. Lai Mohammed 
Ace broadcaster and chairman of first sports radio in Nigeria, Brila FM, Dr. Larry Izamoje and Mr. Wole-Madariola Olumide, an Israel trained modern security specialist who had consulted for many 
multi-national security companies locally and internationally, will be on hand to discuss theme: ‘Relevance Of Social Media As A Tool In Reviving A Recessed Economy and Security Challenges’. 
Also, according to the organizers, former Abia State governor, Dr. Orji Uzor Kalu, Senator Adeola Olamilekan (Yayi) and the Speaker of Lagos State House of Assembly, Rt. Hon. Mudashiru Obasa will join other dignitaries from the corporate and political circles at the lecture. 
Meanwhile, the epoch-making event will also be used to officially launch www.timelineng.com, being run by the chief organizer, Yusuf Adeoye, which berthed in March 2015 Nwafor Polycarp
